name: Flightera Flight Data
description: Flight status, on-time performance and statistics by Flightera

api_methods.name: airlineStatistics
api_methods.description:
Returns detailed airline statistics for airlines identified by the provided identifiers. In most cases the list should contain only one entry, unless the ident is ambiguous.
If searched by ident, only one airline is returned.
One of ident, iata, icao must be provided.
Statistics are calculated overnight and represent the current day's data.

parameters.name: icao
parameters.description: The ICAO code of the airline, must have a length of 4

constraints.inter-dependency: icao, ident, iata: One of these parameters must be provided.

parameters.name: ident
parameters.description: The ident of the airline, as returned by /airline/search

constraints.inter-dependency: icao, ident, iata: One of these parameters must be provided.

parameters.name: iata
parameters.description: The IATA code of the airline, must have a length of 3

constraints.inter-dependency: icao, ident, iata: One of these parameters must be provided.

utterances.utterance: Can you provide the statistics for the airline with the ICAO code AAL?
What are the current statistics for the airline identified as Delta Air Lines?
I need the on-time performance data for the airline with the IATA code DL.
Could you fetch the airline statistics for the ICAO code BAW?
What’s the status of the airline identified as American Airlines?
Please get me the statistics for the airline with the IATA code AA.
Can you show me the airline statistics for the ICAO code UAL?
What’s the on-time performance for the airline identified as United Airlines?
I’d like to see the statistics for the airline with the IATA code UA.
Could you provide the airline statistics for the ICAO code SWA?
